name: Veritex
description:
Veritex is an Indie startup game made by Veritex Studios LLC.

Veritex is a multiplayer survival game based around the concept of super powers (Spells), and massive world bosses. The goal is to get players to fight it out and see people build up mega bases and fight it out on the map.

Some of the features already implemented:

Chat System
Tribe System
Structure System - Thatch, Wood, Stone, and Metal.
Resource Gathering System
Crafting System

Structure system with working structure types:
  • Thatch
  • Wood
  • Stone
  • Metal

Tribe system
Crafting system

10km x 10km open world map filled with different animals, and different resources you can gather.
